page.title: 02RECREATION-SPORT.
page.content: The most popular spectator sport is football. Teams in Scotland are divided into Leagues, the Premier, First and Second according to ability. Teams move up and down these leagues depending on how well they play. The local team Greenock Morton, whose colours are blue and white play at Cappielow Park, situated in the East End of Greenock. As they have just been relegated to the First Division they no longer attract as large a crowd as they once did, but they are still managing to survive. Apart from football there is no other regular spectator sports' arenas in the area. However, because of television many other sports are popular and compete with football eg Snooker, darts and horse racing.
